content: About Rankings Campuses ChicagoGet Around Chicago Get Around Chicago Events Mission President Administration Distinctions History & Timeline Accreditation & Licensure Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>About>Chicago Chicago Find just about anything around the corner. Spend hours studying at your favorite coffee shop ... Discover where some of the country's best improv comedians, and jazz and blues musicians hang out ... Nom on some famous food from Chicago dogs to Morton's hot chocolate cake ... or learn from the city's best and brightest at a tech startup. You can find just about anything around the corner in Chicago, Illinois. 3rd Largest City in the U.S. 190+ Live PerformanceTheatres Home to the 1st Improv Troupe 26 Miles of Lakefront 50 Museums 7 ProfessionalSports Teams 25+ Music Festivals 30+ Fortune 500 Companies Get around Chicago Campuses Maps
